casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Dorothy May WRIGHT. No. 456P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 9, 2008. Robert Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, Rex Gore, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 1st day of October 2008 by Defendant for "Writ of Mandamus for Relief:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 9th day of October 2008."
